Enum TLx493D_IICAddressType_t¶

  • Defined in File tlx493d_types.h

Enum Documentation¶

enum TLx493D_IICAddressType_t¶

The enumeration TLx493D_IICAddressType_t defines the possible I2C addresses of the different sensors. They’re used to establish a connection to the sensor.

Values:

enumerator TLx493D_IIC_ADDR_A0_e¶
enumerator TLx493D_IIC_ADDR_A1_e¶
enumerator TLx493D_IIC_ADDR_A2_e¶
enumerator TLx493D_IIC_ADDR_A3_e¶
enumerator TLx493D_IIC_ADDR_A4_e¶
enumerator TLx493D_IIC_ADDR_A5_e¶
enumerator TLx493D_IIC_ADDR_A6_e¶
enumerator TLx493D_IIC_ADDR_A7_e¶
